title: "CJKV Information Processing" Second Edition
content:
"CJKV Information Processing" Second Edition was published late last month, and is just getting into distribution channels. See: [http://oreilly.com/catalog/9780596514471/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416213653/http:/oreilly.com/catalog/9780596514471/)

The back cover includes a nice quote from Dr. John Warnock, and its Foreword was written by my good friend Robert Bringhurst.

I received the first two copies on Christmas Eve, which were overnighted to me from the printer on the 23rd.
author: lunde

comments.content: I'm waiting for Amazon to ship my copy over. Can't wait!

Well, there goes my New Year's resolution to spend less money...

Seriously, I'm looking forward to reading it.
